attributes.action: M.p's pay to be frozen in line with other public sector workers
attributes.additional_details: Members of parliament should not be allowed to discuss a pay increase for their roles at this time as they are public sector workers. I am also a public sector worker and have had my pay frozen for the past few years. If we are truly 'all in this together' then M.P's pay is not to be increased unless it is done in line with other public sector workers.
